name: AnymeX
subtitle: Your new favourite tracking and management tool
description:
This is the official source for AnymeX.

For full details, check the GitHub repository:
https://github.com/RyanYuuki/AnymeX

apps.name: AnymeX
apps.subtitle: Multiservice tracking client

apps.localizedDescription: AnymeX is a multiservice tracking client, with AniList, MyAnimeList & Simkl support!

### 🎉 New Features

## Changelogs

• UI Overhaul: The player has a brand new look with an improved user interface, making it easier and more enjoyable to use.
• Personalized Lists: Create your own custom library lists for anime/manga. Just click the icon above the share button on the respective page.
• AniList Integration: Add your AniList profile directly to your homepage! Head to the common settings to update it.
• Improved Settings: Check out the new options under the common settings for a more personalized experience.

* [bb268cc](https://github.com/RyanYuuki/AnymeX/commit/bb268cc): feat: portrait switcher in video player
